solution_line_template: Two boxes of pizza amount to ${pizza_price} x {pizza_qty} = $<<{pizza_price}*{pizza_qty}={pizza_total}>>{pizza_total}.
Two packs of juice amount to ${juice_price} x {juice_qty} = $<<{juice_price}*{juice_qty}={juice_total}>>{juice_total}.
Hence, she should return the ${given_money} - ${total_paid} = $<<{given_money}-{total_paid}={money_to_return}>>{money_to_return} to her mother.
